item.description:
I'm hosting another game day at my house in Concord, NH, starting at noon and running until 8 pm or so. My goal, as always, is to push a few unplayed titles onto the table â€“ a goal that has been thwarted again and again. I'm likely to have a few new titles from Japan that will absolutely need attention so that I can cover them on my website prior to a big game convention in October. Come by, and help me test these new games!

RSVP with an arrival time if you're in, and feel free to suggest games that you want to play, too.

Eric
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the host of the house
item.name: Gaming in Concord, NH
